amendment.description: The Secretary of HHS may make grants to purchase ultrasound equipment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 112 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 112 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S1429) The Secretary of HHS may make grants to purchase ultrasound equipment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 112 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 112 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Bunning.
